profile.name: Oluwafemi David
profile.roleHeadline: Full Stack Engineer & AI Systems Developer

items.title: Sandsstores E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Led ReactJS frontend development for a high-performance e-commerce platform serving customers in Pennsylvania, USA. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, deployed on Vercel with AWS S3 integration. Delivered intuitive UI/UX that improved customer engagement and conversion rates.

items.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Research
items.description: Building expertise in context-aware AI systems and multi-agent orchestration. Completed foundational stage (Rookie Builder) focusing on context management, token optimization, and LLM API integration. Currently progressing toward Systems Integration and AI Architecture.

items.title: Favicon Generator Web App
items.description: Full-stack application developed during Software Engineer Internship at Zuri Inc. Designed database schemas using PostgreSQL and prototyped cloud migration solutions. Coordinated cross-functional team of technical interns to deliver production-ready features.

image.alt: Web development tools and code editor

newsletter.title: Let's Build Something Together
newsletter.description: I'm a Computer Engineering student (4.45/5.00 CGPA) passionate about full-stack development and AI systems. Currently working as an AI Model Quality Analyst at Turing while expanding my expertise in Model Context Protocol and multi-agent systems. Open to internship opportunities and collaborative projects.
